tokens.text: validates pack manifest.json file format and structure

title: Manifest Validation
description: Comprehensive validation of pack manifest.json files. Validates format version, UUIDs, header properties, modules, dependencies, subpacks, capabilities, and settings. Ensures manifests comply with Minecraft Bedrock Edition requirements.

fields.title: Invalid Format
fields.description: The manifest format_version is not a recognized value. Valid format versions are 1, 2, or 3. Use format_version 2 for most modern packs.
fields.howToUse: Change format_version to 2 in your manifest.json. This is the recommended version for modern packs: "format_version": 2
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid format_version value

fields.title: Schema Error
fields.description: The manifest.json file does not conform to the expected JSON schema. Check for missing required properties, incorrect property types, or structural errors.
fields.howToUse: Review your manifest.json structure against the documentation at docs.microsoft.com. Common issues include missing commas, incorrect property names, or wrong value types.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains details about the schema violation

fields.title: Manifest Count
fields.description: Each pack must have exactly one manifest.json file at its root. Multiple manifests or missing manifests indicate a pack structure problem.
fields.howToUse: Ensure your pack has exactly one manifest.json file at its root directory. Remove duplicate manifests or add one if missing.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the number of manifests found

fields.title: Missing Property
fields.description: A required property is missing from the manifest header section. Common required properties include name, description, uuid, and version.
fields.howToUse: Add the missing required property to your manifest header. Required properties include: name, description, uuid, and version.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the name of the missing property

fields.title: Required Property
fields.description: A header property that is optional in format_version 1 is required in format_version 2 and above. Update your manifest to include all required header properties.
fields.howToUse: Add the now-required property to your manifest header. If using format_version 2+, more properties are required than in version 1.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the property name now required

fields.title: Version Mismatch
fields.description: The min_engine_version specified requires format_version 2. Either lower the min_engine_version or upgrade to format_version 2.
fields.howToUse: Either upgrade format_version to 2, or lower the min_engine_version. Format version 2 is required for higher engine versions.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the conflicting version values

fields.title: Invalid Scope
fields.description: The pack_scope property must be one of: 'global', 'world', or 'any'. Other values are not recognized.
fields.howToUse: Set pack_scope to one of: 'global', 'world', or 'any'. Remove or correct any other value.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid pack_scope value

fields.title: Multiple Templates
fields.description: The manifest modules array can contain at most one world_template module. Remove extra world_template entries.
fields.howToUse: Remove extra world_template entries from the modules array. Only one world_template module is allowed per manifest.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of world_template modules

fields.title: Invalid Module
fields.description: A module has an unrecognized type. Valid module types include: persona_piece, world_template, skin_pack, data, script, and resources.
fields.howToUse: Change the module type to a valid value: data, resources, script, skin_pack, world_template, or persona_piece.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid module type

fields.title: Duplicate UUID
fields.description: A UUID is used more than once in the manifest. All UUIDs must be unique across header, modules, and dependencies. Generate new unique UUIDs for duplicates.
fields.howToUse: Generate a new unique UUID for each duplicate. Use an online UUID generator or your IDE's UUID generation feature.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the duplicate UUID

fields.title: Invalid UUID
fields.description: A UUID does not conform to the standard UUID format (xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx). Generate a valid UUID using a UUID generator tool.
fields.howToUse: Replace the invalid UUID with a properly formatted one: xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx. Use an online UUID generator.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid UUID value

fields.title: Missing Dep ID
fields.description: A dependency entry is missing both 'module_name' and 'uuid'. Each dependency must have at least one identifier to specify which module it depends on.
fields.howToUse: Add either a 'uuid' or 'module_name' property to the dependency entry to identify which module it depends on.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the dependency index missing an ID

fields.title: Duplicate Dep ID
fields.description: A dependency has both 'module_name' and 'uuid' specified. Use only one identifier per dependency - either module_name (for script modules) or uuid (for packs).
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the dependency with duplicate IDs

fields.title: Invalid Module Name
fields.description: The specified module_name is not in the list of allowed script modules. Valid module names include @minecraft/server, @minecraft/server-ui, etc.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid module_name

fields.title: Version Parse Error
fields.description: A version number could not be parsed. Versions should be arrays of 3 numbers [major, minor, patch] or semantic version strings.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the unparseable version

fields.title: Version Too Low
fields.description: The specified version is lower than the minimum required version for this module or dependency. Update to a supported version.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the version and minimum required

fields.title: Invalid Capability
fields.description: An unrecognized capability is listed. Currently, 'pbr' is the only allowed capability for declaring Vibrant Visuals support.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid capability name

fields.title: Duplicate Folder
fields.description: The same folder name is used by multiple subpacks. Each subpack must reference a unique folder path.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the duplicate folder name

fields.title: Duplicate Subpack
fields.description: The same name is used by multiple subpacks. Each subpack must have a unique identifier name.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the duplicate subpack name

fields.title: Invalid Subpack
fields.description: A subpack name is invalid or empty. Provide a valid name for each subpack entry.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid subpack name

fields.title: Invalid Tier
fields.description: A subpack memory_tier value is below the minimum allowed. Memory tiers must meet or exceed the baseline requirement.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid memory_tier value

fields.title: Settings Missing
fields.description: A settings entry is missing a required property. Settings require name, type, and other properties depending on the setting type.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the missing settings property name

fields.title: Invalid Setting
fields.description: A settings entry has an unrecognized type. Valid types include 'slider' and 'dropdown'.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid setting type

fields.title: Invalid Min/Max
fields.description: For slider settings, the 'min' value must be less than the 'max' value.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid min/max values

fields.title: Slider Default
fields.description: For slider settings, the default value must be a number between min and max (inclusive).
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid default value

fields.title: Dropdown Default
fields.description: For dropdown settings, the default value must be one of the values in the options list.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid dropdown default

fields.title: Invalid Step
fields.description: For slider settings, the step value must be greater than 0 and less than (max - min).
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid step value

fields.title: Duplicate Setting
fields.description: Multiple settings share the same name. Each setting must have a unique name identifier.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the duplicate setting name

fields.title: Missing Namespace
fields.description: Settings names must be namespaced using the format 'namespace:setting_name'. Add a namespace prefix with a colon separator.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the setting name missing namespace

fields.title: Few Options
fields.description: Dropdown settings must have at least 2 options to choose from.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the number of options found

fields.title: Duplicate Option
fields.description: A dropdown setting has duplicate values in its options list. Each option must be unique.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the duplicate option value

fields.title: Base Version Error
fields.description: The base_game_version property requires format_version 2 or higher. Either remove base_game_version or upgrade to format_version 2.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the conflicting version info

fields.title: Wildcard Version
fields.description: Using wildcards (like [1, 21, *]) in base_game_version is not recommended. Specify an exact version for more predictable behavior.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the version with wildcard

fields.title: PBR Engine Version
fields.description: Packs declaring the 'pbr' capability for Vibrant Visuals must have min_engine_version of at least 1.21.120.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the current min_engine_version

fields.title: Missing PBR Cap
fields.description: The pack contains PBR-related files (like .texture_set.json or *_mer.png) but does not declare the 'pbr' capability in the manifest. Add 'capabilities': ['pbr'] to your manifest.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the PBR file path found
